Articles.Content:
Here is something to consider. How about trying to get to Mun or Minmus, without achieving orbit. 

The Challenge is... to get to the mun or minmus without orbiting.

This means that you can not have ny stable orbits. You cant orbit kerbin or mun or minmus. It must all be sub orbital

Normal Mode: Just get there

Hard mode: Get back

Very Hard Mode: Impress me

You need proof via video or pics. No hyperedit of alt+f12 . It must be stock and mechjeb is allowed. If there are any other mods that you think would be fair please tell me about it and i will consider adding it.

Have fun and good luck

That's what I did. Massive launcher, direct to the Mun. Not orbital once.

3 crew to the East crater! Enjoy:

 

Oh, and all stock, only with texture revamps.

And here you go ... Suborbital to the Mun, slingshot around the Mun to Minmus and return safely to Kerbin

You can watch the video HERE
